snippet: Coca-Cola has said it is cooperating with Chinese authorities who are investigating whether its employees engaged in illegal mapping using GPS devices in Yunnan Province.
abstract: Coca-Cola says it is cooperating with Chinese authorities investigating whether its employees engaged in illegal mapping using GPS devices in Yunnan Province.
lead_paragraph: Coca-Cola has said it is cooperating with Chinese authorities who are investigating whether its employees engaged in illegal mapping using GPS devices in Yunnan Province.

headline.main: China: Coca-Cola Asked About GPS Use
headline.print_headline: China: Coca-Cola Asked About GPS Use
